tweet: I'm may be slow, but is the whole Twilight thing based on a girl's difficulty choosing between an emo boyfriend and a jock? No brainiacs?
The cast was off the lot today. It's a bit like being a parent and hiding out upstairs while your kids have a party downstairs, wondering...
Back in my slow jalopy this morning, putt-putting along the PCH, eyeballing surfers and stand-up paddlers from the slow lane.
THIS is why I drive an old jalopy. Racing back from Northern California in a real car, it's like a race. Get out of my way! Coming thru!
